func_sig.description: Calculate the volume and surface area of a geometric shape given its dimensions. Added calculation for the diagonal of a cube.
func_sig.name: calculate_code_properties

dimensions.description: The dimensions needed for the calculation, such as radius, height, etc.

shape.description: The type of the shape, e.g., cone, sphere, cylinder, cube.

func_sig.description: Calculate the Euclidean distance between two points in 3D space.
func_sig.name: calculate_distance_3d

point1.description: The first point in the format [x, y, z]

point2.description: The second point in the format [x,y,z]

func_sig.description: Solve mathematical problems using sympy for symbolic computation, supports solving equations and evaluating expressions.
func_sig.name: solve_math_problem_fixed

equations.description: An array of mathematical equations to be solved.

variables.description: An array of variables involved in the equations.
